examplePhrases: Alexa ask pampas facts for a fact
Alexa tell pampas facts to tell me trivia
en-AU.name: pampas Facts
en-AU.description:
Ask for pampas Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

pampas Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch pampas Facts" or "Alexa, open pampas Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
